review: It's OK nothing special so far wouldn't connect to primary network not sure why not but I got it to another  network.  Like that it has showtime on it and the remote works good.  I have tried games on it yet but the UI is clear and we'll thought out
author: Honest Mike

review: Love the Fire TV Stick.  Very fast and shows are crystal clear. Highly recommended.
author: Armand

review: I LOVE IT. Would like access to local news channels but all in all its wonderful
author: christine

review: Seemingly better then chromecast thus far, chromecast seems cheap compared to this. My chromecast broke after just a couple weeks, my kids broke it, but I would've expected it to be well built like the firestick.
author: s33wagz

review: Easy set up ... great selection ... Prime is great!
author: B. Moose Peterson

review: Very slick. Nice interface and very responsive.
author: O Daddy

review: This little package works very well. I really only bought it for Netflix so I'm not the best test but still well worth $20.
author: Christopher
